about_the_game:
OUTSIDERS is a third-person shooter blending survival horror with intense cooperative gameplay, designed exclusively for two players.

Set on a remote island shrouded in mystery, you and a friend embark on a journey to uncover its dark secrets while confronting disturbing enemies and relentless challenges.

Explore a vast map with diverse landscapes, ranging from dense forests and abandoned ruins to underground caves and decaying villages. Each location offers a unique atmosphere filled with hidden dangers and puzzles that test your skills and teamwork.

Key Features:

  • Rich and Immersive World
    Discover a living island full of interconnected areas, stories to unravel, and secrets to uncover.

  • Unique and Innovative Enemies
    Face creatures that break genre conventions, each with distinctive behaviors and traits that force you to adapt your strategies constantly.

  • Intense Cooperative Gameplay
    Leverage the complementary abilities of two protagonists:

    • Her: A skilled sharpshooter with precise aim but vulnerable in close combat. She can pass through tight spaces and is faster.

    • Him: Strong and agile in melee combat, excelling at heavy blows but less effective with firearms. He cannot fit through tight spaces but can push or lift heavy objects.

  • Atmospheric Environments
    Immersive sound design and detailed visuals create constant tension, with scares and dangers keeping you on edge.

  • Engaging Puzzles
    Solve creative and challenging puzzles to progress, often requiring perfect coordination with your partner.

In OUTSIDERS, every step is a choice, and every discovery brings you closer to a truth more terrifying than any enemy.

content_descriptors.notes: Due to its explicit nature, the game is not recommended for audiences sensitive to violent or disturbing content. Caution is advised for those who may feel uncomfortable with scenes of realistic violence or the appearance of substances such as alcohol or tobacco.

name: Outsiders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 (quad-core).
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 / AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6 GB) / AMD RX 580 (8 GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space

short_description: In this co-op Survival Horror game, two shipwrecked survivors are stranded on an uncharted island, facing terrifying creatures and puzzles. Work together to explore, survive, and uncover the island's dark secrets before it consumes you both.
